Title: Testing the Tuskarrsenal
Description:
The first weapon is ready! Soaking the bones in river water warmed by the djaradin's fire made them more pliable. I'll remember that trick!

Since you've been helpful so far, I'll do you the honor of letting you test out some authentic Uktulut weaponry. You'll find no sharper blade or sturdier haft this side of the Dragon Isles.

Go test this out in our training area for me. Maybe it'll remind the chieftain what real fighting looks like! Ha!
ObjectivesText: Take the Uktulut Bone Spear and destroy 4 Tuskarr Training Dummies.
